question: Do I need coding or software development experience to create my site?
answer: No coding required! Every template is designed with out of the box features to make creating your site simple and fast. Simply fill out the template and launch your site!

question: Is Vertex.360 free?
answer: Vertex sites are completely free to start, including all of its easy-to-use, out of the box features. Unlimited test sites, CMS, and downloadable code are free and accessible to all users. Once you are ready to attach a custom domain to your site, you can begin an affordable plan at only $5 per month. Also included in payment, in addition to a custom domain and the rest of the Vertex features, is automatic SSL.
